title: Wearing braces, retainer, cavity removed, having filling or crown affect wudu or ghusl Assimalhakeem
transcript: muhammad from the u.s he says that if i had a cavity removed and a filling placed would that impact my wudu or russell dancers totally not even if you wear a retainer or braces this has no impact on your wooden because wudu is not when you wash your mouth it's not like washing your hand there has to be no barriers and the mouth is a different thing so even if you have braces or a retainer or put cavities or a crown this has no impact none whatsoever you
